suite.name: Correct Filling

test.name: Verify if filling out the form correctly inserts the data into the list and creates a new card in the expected team

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Given I fill out the form fields
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'Odontologista legal' into text field 'id:form-cargo'.

kw.name: Image Url
kw.doc: Returns URL to placeholder image Example: http://placehold.it/640x480

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Then I should identify the card in the expected team
Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

suite.name: Incorrect Filling

test.name: Verify if the system displays a required field message when a required field is not filled out correctly

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Given I click the "Create Card" button
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Then the system should display a required field message
Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
